caption: Process Trait
description: Process trait defines attributes shared by process alert and activity events.

actor_process.description: The process that performed the operation or action on the target process. For example, the process that could have started a new process or injected code into another process.

module.description: The module that was injected by the actor process.

process.description: The process that was launched, injected into, opened, or terminated.

user.description: The user that started/created the new process.
